definition: to provide a place to stay/to house/to accommodate/(of an institution etc) to take in/to accept
to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)
custody and reeducation (administrative punishment for prostitutes)

sentences.english: Tara - an animal lover, she volunteers at a variety of local Animal Shelters.
sentences.chinese: 她是一個動物情人，她在當地許多的動物收容所服務。

sentences.english: These towns already host hundreds of IDPs.
sentences.chinese: 這些城鎮現已收容了數百名國內流離失所者。

sentences.english: When necessary, he may also be taken in by the government for reeducation.
sentences.chinese: 在必要的時候，也可以由政府收容教養。

sentences.english: I met Connie the day she was admitted to the hospice room, where I worked as a volunteer.
sentences.chinese: 我是在康妮住進收容所病房的那天見到她的。

sentences.english: I like convent but I wish they will not admit any women under the age of fifty.
sentences.chinese: 朕喜歡女修道院，其不至收容年齡五十以下之婦人。

sentences.english: Drain fuel tank dry into holding tank or a properly labeled diesel safety container.
sentences.chinese: 排幹燃油箱至收容箱或適當標誌爲迪塞爾的安全容器。

sentences.english: In Massachusetts, homeless shelters are at capacity.
sentences.chinese: 馬薩諸塞州的收容所已經爆滿。

sentences.english: Beth Hemmer's 13-year-old daughter Lena has volunteered at the shelter for two years.
sentences.chinese: 貝絲13歲的女兒在收容所已經做了兩年的志願者了。

sentences.english: She says the Africans currently residing in the camp are desperate to get away.
sentences.chinese: 現在住在收容營裏的非洲人迫切希望離開。

sentences.english: We are not surprised that Iraq is harboring Zarqawi and his subordinates.
sentences.chinese: 對於伊拉克收容扎卡威和他的手下我們並不奇怪。

sentences.english: And with one long last look, I turned and left the hospice.
sentences.chinese: 最後久久地凝視了她一眼，我轉身離開了收容所。

sentences.english: The center has already taken 53 pandas that had been living at the Wolong Nature Reserve.
sentences.chinese: 中心已經收容了臥龍自然保護區內的53只大熊貓。

sentences.english: Lidiya Shulga is the director of a shelter for abandoned children.
sentences.chinese: 沙佳是收容遺棄孩童庇護所的主任。

sentences.english: On landing, we immediately sought asylum.
sentences.chinese: 下了飛機，我們立刻尋找收容所。

sentences.english: A bell rings when someone puts a baby in the box.
sentences.chinese: 當有人把孩子放進收容箱後，就會有鈴聲響起。

sentences.english: We are looking for other sites for new camps.
sentences.chinese: 我們也正在尋找修建其他的新收容所的位址。

definition: to incorporate into one's troops/to weave in
to detain/to take into custody/to imprison temporarily
to hunt and arrest (fugitives)/to track down and arrest/a manhunt
to find a place for/to help settle down/to arrange for/to get into bed/placement
